                                              # æ­å»º VueX ç¯å¢ƒ

                                              // ./store/index.js VueXæ ¹æ–‡ä»¶
import Vue from "vue";

import VueX from "vuex";

Vue.use(VueX);

//å‡†å¤‡åŠ¨ä½œactions
const actions = {
  increment(context, value) {
    context.commit("INCREMENT", value);
  },
  decrement(context, value) {
    context.commit("DECREMENT", value);
  },
  incrementOdd(context, value) {
    if (context.state.num % 2) context.commit("INCREMENT", value);
  },
  incrementAysnc(context, value) {
    setTimeout(() => {
      context.commit("INCREMENT", value);
    }, 1000);
  },
};

//å‡†å¤‡å˜åŒ–mutations
const mutations = {
  INCREMENT(state, value) {
    state.num += value;
  },
  DECREMENT(state, value) {
    state.num -= value;
  },
};

//å‡†å¤‡æ•°æ®çŠ¶æ€state
const state = {
  num: 0,
};

const getters = {
  tenTime() {
    return state.num * 10;
  },
};

export default new VueX.Store({
  actions,
  mutations,
  state,
  getters,
});

                                              // main.js
import store from './store'

new Vue({
  store,
  render: (h) => h(App),
  beforeCreate() {
    Vue.prototype.$bus = this;
  },
}).$mount("#app");

  xxx: initValue,

                                              â€‹ åœ¨ç»„ä»¶ä¸­ä½¿ç”¨ $store.dispatch('å¯¹åº”çš„ action å›è°ƒå')è§¦å‘

                                              4.å¯ä»¥åŒ…å«å¼‚æ­¥ä»£ç ï¼ˆå®šæ—¶å™¨ï¼Œajaxï¼‰

  zzz({ commit, state }, data1) {

  mmm(state) {

                                              # mapState

                                              æ˜ å°„ state ä¸­çš„æ•°æ®ä¸ºè®¡ç®—å±æ€§ã€‚

                                              import { mapState } from "vuex";

export default {
  computed: {
    // å€ŸåŠ©mapStateç”Ÿæˆè®¡ç®—å±æ€§ï¼šsumã€schoolã€subjectï¼ˆå¯¹è±¡å†™æ³•ï¼‰
    ...mapState({ sum: "sum", school: "school", subject: "subject" }),
    // å€ŸåŠ©mapStateç”Ÿæˆè®¡ç®—å±æ€§ï¼šsumã€schoolã€subjectï¼ˆæ•°ç»„å†™æ³•ï¼‰
    ...mapState(["sum", "school", "subject"]),
  },
};

                                              # mapGetters

                                              æ˜ å°„ getters ä¸­çš„æ•°æ®ä¸ºè®¡ç®—å±æ€§ã€‚

                                              import { mapGetters } from "vuex";

export default {
  computed: {
    // å€ŸåŠ©mapGettersç”Ÿæˆè®¡ç®—å±æ€§ï¼šbigSumï¼ˆå¯¹è±¡å†™æ³•ï¼‰
    ...mapGetters({ bigSum: "bigSum" }),
    // å€ŸåŠ©mapGettersç”Ÿæˆè®¡ç®—å±æ€§ï¼šbigSumï¼ˆæ•°ç»„å†™æ³•ï¼‰
    ...mapGetters(["bigSum"]),
  },
};

                                              # mapActions

                                              ç”Ÿæˆä¸ actions å¯¹è¯çš„æ–¹æ³•ï¼Œå³åŒ…å«$store.dispatch(xxx)çš„å‡½æ•°

                                              import { mapActions } from "vuex";

export default {
  methods: {
    // å€ŸåŠ©mapActionsç”Ÿæˆï¼šincrementOddã€incrementWaitï¼ˆå¯¹è±¡å†™æ³•ï¼‰
    ...mapActions({ incrementOdd: "jiaOdd", incrementWait: "jiaWait" }),
    // å€ŸåŠ©mapActionsç”Ÿæˆï¼šjiaOddã€jiaWaitï¼ˆæ•°ç»„å†™æ³•ï¼‰
    ...mapActions(["jiaOdd", "jiaWait"]),
  },

                                              # mapMutations

                                              ç”Ÿæˆä¸ mutations å¯¹è¯çš„æ–¹æ³•ï¼Œå³åŒ…å«$store.commit(yyy)çš„å‡½æ•°

                                              import { mapMutations } from "vuex";

export default {
  methods: {
    // å€ŸåŠ©mapMutationsç”Ÿæˆï¼šincrementã€decrementï¼ˆå¯¹è±¡å†™æ³•ï¼‰
    ...mapMutations({ increment: "JIA", decrement: "JIAN" }),
    // å€ŸåŠ©mapMutationsç”Ÿæˆï¼šJIAã€JIANï¼ˆæ•°ç»„å†™æ³•ï¼‰
    ...mapMutations(["JIA", "JIAN"]),
  },
};

                                              # module å‘½åç©ºé—´

                                              1. åŒ…å«å¤šä¸ª module
                                              2. ä¸€ä¸ª module æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ª store çš„é…ç½®å¯¹è±¡

	namespaced: true,	//å¼€å¯å‘½åç©ºé—´
	state: {x: 1},
	mutations: { â€¦â€¦ },

    	bigSum(state){
    		return state.sum * 10

const personAbout = {
	namespaced: true,
	state = { â€¦â€¦ },
	mutations: { â€¦â€¦ }ï¼Œ

		personAbout

                                              2.å¼€å¯å‘½åç©ºé—´åï¼Œç»„ä»¶ä¸­è¯»å– state æ•°æ®
